import { useState } from 'react' import Header from './components/Header'; import Shop from './components/Shop'; import About from './components/About'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Nav from './components/Nav' import EachProduct from './components/EachProduct'; //IMAGES import hoodieOne from './images/hoodie1.jpg' import hoodieTwo from './images/hoodie2.jpg' import teeOne from './images/tee1.jpg' import teeTwo from './images/tee2.jpg' function App() { const [products] = useState([ { title: "CAMO HOODIE", tag: "CamoHoodie", info: "Our 14oz. heavy-weight MTHWSH Crewneck features an alternative logo in an off-white print. Designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, (CA)", price: 90, img: hoodieOne, id: 1, quantity: 1 }, { title: "PRIDE HOODIE", tag: "PrideHoodie", info: "Our 14oz. heavy-weight MTHWSH Crewneck features an alternative logo in an off-white print. Designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, (CA)", price: 80, img: hoodieTwo, id: 2, quantity: 1 } ]) const [tees] = useState([ { title: "CC TEE", tag: "CCTee", info: "Our 14oz. heavy-weight MTHWSH Crewneck features an alternative logo in an off-white print. Designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, (CA)", price: 32, img: teeOne, id: 3, quantity: 1 }, { title: "KLEPTO TEE", tag: "KleptoTee", info: "Our 14oz. heavy-weight MTHWSH Crewneck features an alternative logo in an off-white print. Designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, (CA)", price: 32, img: teeTwo, id: 4, quantity: 1 } ]) return (
); } export default App;
